channel.title: [718/753] Graphical Issues
channel.description:
I've just recently downloaded the 718/753 client and server and have been playing around with it for a little now. There are a few things that I noticed and I'm unsure how to fix them or if they can be fixed.
1. On Tutorial Island there is a house that is missing an entire wall. How can I add the wall back? If there is something out there already that explains this please just point me in that direction.
<<See Screenshot Below>>
2. Giant Rats become distorted when they are attacked? They path around just fine but while being attacked they distort. Is this a rendering issue or just updating their attack emote?
<<See Screenshot Below>>
Not sure if this is a cache issue with the server I downloaded or if this is something that can be corrected manually. I've done a fair amount of searching and haven't found anything on these issues.
Thanks for any help or nudges in the right direction. Cheers!

item.title: [718/753] Graphical Issues
item.dc:creator: @BeerChug BeerChug
item.description:
@BeerChug wrote:

I’ve just recently downloaded the 718/753 client and server and have been playing around with it for a little now. There are a few things that I noticed and I’m unsure how to fix them or if they can be fixed.

  1. On Tutorial Island there is a house that is missing an entire wall. How can I add the wall back? If there is something out there already that explains this please just point me in that direction.

<>

  1. Giant Rats become distorted when they are attacked? They path around just fine but while being attacked they distort. Is this a rendering issue or just updating their attack emote?

<>

Not sure if this is a cache issue with the server I downloaded or if this is something that can be corrected manually. I’ve done a fair amount of searching and haven’t found anything on these issues.

Thanks for any help or nudges in the right direction.
Cheers!
